Headline: #75 74th-75th Temporary Eastbound Reroute near 74th/Loomis
ShortDescription: Eastbound 75 74th-75th buses are temporarily rerouted via 74th, Ashland, 76th and Loomis: due to, street blockage near 74th/Loomis.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How will this affect my trip?

 

Eastbound #75 74th-75th buses are temporarily rerouted via 74th, Ashland. 76th, Loomis and over regular route, due to street blockage near 74th/Loomis.

Westbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #78 Montrose Temporary Westbound Reroute near Forest Preserve Avenue/Oak Park
ShortDescription: WB 78 Montrose buses are temp. rerouted via Forest Preserve, Oak Park, Irving Park, Harlem and Forest Preserve: near Forest Preserve Avenue/Oak Park.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How will this affect my trip?

 

Westbound #78 Montrose buses are temporarily rerouted via Forest Preserve, Oak Park, Irving Park, Harlem, Forest Preserve and into the terminal, due to street blockage near Forest Preserve/Oak Park.

Eastbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: SB #26 South Shore Express Temporary Southbound Reroute near 106th/Mackinaw
ShortDescription: SB #26 South Shore Exp buses are rerouted via Ewing, 100th,Torrence, 106th, then resume over their normal route, due to street blockage near 106th/Mackinaw.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How does this affect my trip?

Southbound #26 South Shore Express buses are temporarily rerouted via Ewing, 100th,Torrence, 106th, then resume over their normal route.

Northbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Why is service being changed?

Buses are rerouted due to street blockage near 106th/Mackinaw.
